p:
Natural products, such as essential oils, have historically proven their value as a source of molecules with antimicrobial potential, and may have high potential in bacterial and fungal infections in the near future. Indeed, the synergistic interaction of essential oils with antimicrobials has been previously reported as a valid approach to prevent the emergence of multidrug resistance by restoring their antimicrobial effect and reducing adverse effects of synthetic antimicrobials
